lst.name: sentence
lst.str: First City, the big Texas bank hit hardest by the downturn in oil prices, lost a record 402 mln dlrs in fiscal year 1986 and has said it is seeking a merger partner or some other capital assistance.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: First City said about half of the loans sold to Prudential came from its Energy Finance Co., an entity formed in 1982 to loan money to "more venturesome" oil borrowers that promised a higher potential return.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Day said some had already been classified as nonperforming, or charged off as a loss, but he could not identify how many were included in those categories.
